items.title: Here’s The Best Time To See The Ursid Meteor Shower This Sunday
items.description: The Ursid meteor shower peaks on Sunday, Dec. 21, just after the solstice, with ideal viewing conditions and dark skies just after sunset.

items.title: Apple’s iPhone Fold Faces Production Issues Ahead Of Launch, Report Says
items.description: A new report from an industry heavyweight suggests Apple’s most ambitious iPhone may face delays.

items.title: Winter Solstice 2025: Why Sunday Is The Shortest Day Of The Year
items.description: The 2025 winter solstice happens on Sunday, Dec. 21, bringing the longest night and marking the start of astronomical winter. Here’s how it all works ...

items.title: Here's The Anthony Joshua Punch That Broke Jake Paul's Jaw
items.description: Anthony Joshua stopped Jake Paul with a brutal right hand in round 6 that broke Paul's jaw. Here's the video and full card results.

items.title: Why Some Believe An All-Out AGI Versus AGI Battle Will Determine The True Alpha AGI
items.description: If we attain AGI (artificial general intelligence) some believe that multiple AGIs will battle for dominance. Here's the inside scoop and what we need...
